name: bootstrap-basic
description: 1. Initilizing package.json file `npm init -y`  2. Install [Webpack](https://webpack.js.org/guides/getting-started/)  ``` npm install webpack webpack-cli --save-dev  ```  3. Recompiling our sass file though webpack dev server ``` npm install webpack-dev-server --save-dev ```  4. Installing font awesome under repository of fortawesome ``` npm install @fontawesome/fontawesome-free --save-dev ```  5. configuring webpack ``` npx webpack --config webpack.config.js ```  6. Install fibers
